feed.title: Big Trout Lake - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Big Trout Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:29 AM CST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 35.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 35. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 46 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High minus 28.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h late in the morning. High minus 28. Wind chill minus 48 in the morning and minus 41 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 37.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 37. Wind chill minus 42 in the evening and minus 49 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. High minus 24.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 24. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 36.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 36. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High minus 21.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 21. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 31.

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 14. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of flurries. High minus 14. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 20 February 2023
